- Check modelling for Sex, Age (Male), Age (Female), Menopausal status
- Perform crossvalidation on the best models to pick the best one for different metrics
- find best features
- do they have sth in common? Can we take that into consideration when modelling? 
- are there any confounders?
- Is the distribution of variables important?

- Confusion matrix (LDA, LogReg, ...)

Going Crazy (if time allows)
- voting classifiers/regressors
- Stacking
- skewness of variables
- tsne
